title: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When attempting to right click on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, no popup menu is displayed.
EB: When right clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a menu should appear allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected: A menu should popup allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
